QuestData.Title: WANTED: Thundersnout
QuestData.Description: Thundersnout is the largest of the boars in the valley. She is wreaking havoc on the nearby farms and their crops.$b$bMayor Roz of Brennadam has issued a bounty for proof of her demise.$b$bThundersnout's location is near Briarback kraul, so be on the look out for quilboar!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The earth rumbles at her passing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Thundersnout's Snout to Mayor Roz.
QuestData.RewardText: The death of the matriarch means the next generation of boars will be delayed. Nice work.
